Description:
Explore your Empire
Located in the heart of Epping, like a star in the north, Empire Epping will rise above the rest offering unsurpassed premium real estate opportunities with apartments offering 1, 2 & 3 bedroom configurations with quality fixtures and fittings, garage allocation, inhouse gym and wellness centre, cafes, restaurants and supermarket.
Just minutes from the door of EMPIRE EPPING you'll find a world of facilities and amenities — everything you and your family need to live, learn and work. Less than 2km away is Pacific Epping, one of the region's largest shopping precincts, boasting 230-plus stores, three major supermarkets, fresh food precinct, bars, cafes and restaurants and more.
Setting a new standard in high-end integrated living, EMPIRE EPPING offers a complete lifestyle package in one of Melbourne's most affordable up-and-coming areas. Whether you're looking to set your family up in style, downsize for luxury and convenience, or invest in a hot growth region, claim your place in EMPIRE EPPING - A World Within.
This document has been prepared to assist solely in the marketing of this property. While all care has been taken to ensure the information provided herein is
correct, we do not take responsibility for any inaccuracies.
Accordingly all interested parties should make their own enquiries to verify the information.
http://rata.harcourts.com.au/Home/statement-of-information
Due diligence checklist - for home and residential property buyers - http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist.

Description:
PRIME LOCATION, LOW MAINTANCE LIVING!
Nest or invest' Whatever your circumstances, this well positioned property can cater to your needs. This 1 bedroom apartment, centrally located bathroom with a generous sized kitchen, plus a spacious lounge and dining area. With sliding doors that open up to your very own private balcony. Other features include heating, cooling, security entrance and secure parking. This well-priced first home or investment awaits! Currently let to a great tenant, paying $1,217 per month on a periodic tenancy.
• 150m walk to Woolworths
• 350m Epping Views Primary School
• 3km to Epping Train Station
• 3km to Epping Hospital

Description:
Location, Comfort & Affordability!
This immaculately presented family home is sure to delight the fussiest of buyer. Boasting 3 generous-sized bedrooms, master offering full ensuite & walk in robe & built in robes to all bedrooms. A standout kitchen commands center stage with its quality stainless steel appliances, walk in pantry & dishwasher. The natural light-filled living & dining areas that effortlessly links up to the large undercover alfresco that is fully decked and accompanied by a low maintenance beautiful landscaped garden is perfect for outdoor entertaining all year round. Extras include ducted heating, cooling, double remote control garage, security cameras, alarm, ceiling fans and located within walking distance to local schools, shops, cafes, transport and parkland.
Whether you're looking for your first home or a solid investment opportunity or downsizing, you simply cannot afford to miss this one! PHOTO ID REQUIRED

Description:
FIVE STAR LUXURY LIFESTYLE
Why wait any longer? No need to check into that luxurious hotel when everyday is a holiday.
This amazing home is set in one of the finest locations in the exclusive Lyndarum Estate. Over two levels this residence has a grand and lavish lifestyle that leaves you breathless the moment you enter. You will find quality workmanship throughout the home that has been finished to absolute perfection and is designed for a growing family that is looking for that added privacy and ultimate in family living.
Downstairs, you will find a master bedroom with ensuite and walk in robe, stunning kitchen complimented with black granite benchtops, island breakfast bar, family/living that steps out to quality polished decking, gazebo and manicured gardens designed for entertaining all year round.
Upstairs, offers 4 bedrooms, massive master bedroom with ensuite and walk in robe, parents retreat, own private balcony overlooking the magnificent park views, two bedrooms that have their own ensuites, whilst the third bedroom has their own ensuite and walk in robe. The family can relax in the retreat area or watch their favorite movie in the theatre room, with spectacular city skyline views that can also be seen from the bedrooms. This home has surely everything to offer for that most fastidious buyer.
With Added Features include
LED Lighting
Ducted Heating
Refridgerated cooling with Zoning
Quality Window Furnishings
High Quality Light Fittings
Timber Floorboards
Security Alarm System
Intercom
Huge Double Remote Garage with Internal Access
Ample Storage Cupboards
And much, much more
Living at Lyndarum you will enjoy an enviable lifestyle with schools, kindergartens, parklands within walking distance, local shopping centres, cinemas, restaurants and the northern hospital all within easy reach. Only 26km approx north of the CBD with convenient access to the Hume Freeway and Ring Road, this is the perfect location.
Don't miss out on a once in a lifetime opportunity to purchase this stunning home. Enquire today.

Description:
Perfectly Tranquil Cul De Sac
Peacefully positioned in a tranquil cul-de-sac setting metres from the Darebin parklands, playgrounds and paved bicycle tracks yet so close to everything sits this beautiful 4 bedroom family home on 661M2 (approx), With 2 spacious living zones, master bedroom with WIRs and ensuite, BIRs to other 3 bedrooms, bathroom with corner spa, open plan living, the Tasmanian Oak kitchen with breakfast bar and s/steel appliances including dishwasher, overlooks the spacious light filled family room. Enjoy year round comfort with a cosy woodfired heater, gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling and the shady cover of the al fresco area for relaxed summer BBQs, fully landscaped low maintenance with water features and paving all round, garden shed, double garage and further parking for cars or caravan. Take advantage of this quiet and picturesque part of Epping: enjoy a healthy lifestyle with the bicycle paths and parklands, only minutes to Epping train station, shops & schools. Inspection is a must!
In Room - Auction Thursday 2nd November @ 7:00PM
Venue: Ray White Epping - 769 High Street, Epping
Jim Vlahos
0434 382 485

Description:
Explore your Empire
Located in the heart of Epping, like a star in the north, Empire Epping will rise above the rest offering unsurpassed premium real estate opportunities with apartments offering 1, 2 & 3 bedroom configurations with quality fixtures and fittings, garage allocation, inhouse gym and wellness centre, cafes, restaurants and supermarket.
Just minutes from the door of EMPIRE EPPING you'll find a world of facilities and amenities — everything you and your family need to live, learn and work. Less than 2km away is Pacific Epping, one of the region's largest shopping precincts, boasting 230-plus stores, three major supermarkets, fresh food precinct, bars, cafes and restaurants and more.
Setting a new standard in high-end integrated living, EMPIRE EPPING offers a complete lifestyle package in one of Melbourne's most affordable up-and-coming areas. Whether you're looking to set your family up in style, downsize for luxury and convenience, or invest in a hot growth region, claim your place in EMPIRE EPPING - A World Within.

Description:
Large family home that exceeds expectations!
Set in a fantastic location close to leading lifestyle amenities, here is an outstanding opportunity to buy into this sought-after neighbourhood and secure your family's future. Large and growing families will find all the space they seek with bedrooms and bathrooms on both levels with multiple living areas also. The home offers:
- 4 x Bedrooms (main with full Ensuite and WIR)
- 3 x Bathrooms in total
- Formal lounge upon entry with soaring ceilings
- Tassie oak timber kitchen with new s/s gas appliances and dishwasher
- Adjoining meals and extended 2nd living space
- Upstairs retreat, study or 3rd living area
- Generous size rear yard for the kids with pergola entertaining area
- Garden shed
- Gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling and alarm system
- Double lock up brick garage
All this positioned only minutes away from the Epping Plaza shopping centre, Epping train station and both Epping Secondary College and Derby Meadows Preschool, public transport and beautiful parklands. There's simply too much to mention in words, only an inspection will do. Inspection a must!
Please come and see me at one of our offices below to discuss your real estate needs.

Description:
Great Opportunity in the Perfect Location
If you’re looking to purchase your first home, extend your property portfolio, or simply looking to downsize, this home may be the one for you.
Located opposite parkland this immaculate home comprises of three generous size bedrooms, main bedroom featuring walk in robe and access to the main bathroom, open plan kitchen meals family area at the rear of the residence that opens onto a large outdoor entertaining space.
Features include low maintenance yard that requires little to no work, stainless steel appliances, ducted heating for the cool winter nights, remote roller shutters throughout the home to keep in the cool or warm air, 3 split systems throughout the home and internal access from the single garage.
Offering a great lifestyle in a growing suburb and ample accommodation to suit almost everyone’s needs.
***PHOTO ID REQUIRED UPON INSPECTION***
Land Size: 303sqm approx.
Age of Property: 8 years approx.
Hot Water Service: Instantaneous Gas Hot Water
Heating: Gas Ducted Heating
Cooling: 3 x Split System Cooling
Chattels: All fixtures and fittings as inspected
Deposit Terms: 10% of the purchase price
Preferred Settlement: 30/60 days
Nearest Primary Schools: Harvest Home Primary School, St Mary of the Cross MacKillop, Epping Views Primary School and Epping Primary School
Nearest Secondary School: Al Siraat College, Epping Secondary and St Monica’s Secondary

Introducing a strikingly beautiful residence that provides admirable accommodation. Ideally suited for any family looking to enter the market or investor with a keen eye for a lucrative asset this property will have something for everyone. Sitting on a generous allotment of 591sqm (Approximately) with three generous sized bedrooms master featuring a central bathroom with duel access, spacious living area, lavish kitchen fitted quality appliances with an adjoined meals area. Ideally located within close proximity to shops, public transport and ample choice in elementary and secondary schools, this property is a must inspect!

Description:
Renovated & Immaculate
This fabulous home ticks all the boxes when it comes to enjoyable living, within minutes to everything Epping has to offer from Epping Plaza, Northern Hospital, Epping Station, Greenbrook Shops, an abundance of options for schools and public transport this property is ideal for first home buyers and investors alike. Consisting of 4 bedrooms, main bathroom and plenty off street parking this will surely impress. The property has been upgraded and modernized so enjoy
- Waterfall Stone bench tops with glass splash backs
- 900mm Stainless Steal Appliances
- 3 Bedrooms with BIR's (optional 4th bedroom/study)
- Modern & Renovated main bathroom with floor to ceiling tiles
- Ducted Heating & Split System Cooling
- Pergola overlooking large rear yard
- Double Lock-up Carport with drive thru access
- Floating flooring throughout
- Extensive downlights
- Garden Shed
Don't miss out on this fantastic opportunity to secure this fantastic property close too everything Epping has on offer, currently on lease until April 2018 and currently leased for $360 per week.

Description:
Simply Move Straight In
This immaculately presented family home in a sought after pocket of Epping presents a great opportunity for all home buyers. Set on a 551sqm block this family home provides an abundance of space, quality fittings and a wealth of natural light. Let beautiful hardwood timber floors guide you through three spacious bedrooms with BIR, bright central bathroom, spacious lounge and dining and a stunning renovated kitchen with stone bench tops and s/s appliances. With seamless transition from inside to out enjoy the great size decked alfresco area overlooking a big rear yard perfect for entertaining family and friends all year round. Additional Features include ducted heating, air-conditioning, down lights, quality window furnishings, double lock up garage and renovated laundry with external access. Close to shops, public transport and in numerous school zones, this property is a must see, don't be the one to miss out on this great opportunity.

Description:
Freshly Renovated Classic
Set in one of Epping's most sought after pockets, is this recently renovated classic that is sure to tick all the right boxes. This stunning family home features four bedrooms, three with built in robes including master with WIR and ensuite, large living area with adjoining dining and gourmet kitchen fitted with 40mm stone bench tops and S/S appliances.
Great features to the home include freshly polished boards throughout living, steel appliances, split system heating/cooling, quality window furnishings, single garage with additional second entrance with cross over, perfect for any boat/trailer/car or caravan enthusiast alike, landscaped front and rear gardens and much more.
All this set on a generous 584m² approx. in a quiet court location.
Within close proximity to Northern Hospital, Epping plaza and local shopping centres, established schools, Epping train station and bus services.
This home is perfect start for first home buyers or one to add to any investor's portfolio. Don't miss your opportunity to purchase this property.
Please come and see me at one of our offices below to discuss your real estate needs.
